This rare offering represents one of the last opportunities to build on the Tennessee River in this coveted neighborhood, where luxury homes and natural beauty create an unparalleled living environment just minutes from downtown amenities. Lakemoor Hills or Lake Hills is sometimes referred to as ''South Sequoyah'' due to its location across the river from Sequoyah Hills. And with over 450 homes, many with lake frontage, lake views, or ample acreage, Lakemoor Hills, like Sequoyah Hills, is a mighty fine place to call home.Due to the wonderful, heavily treed areas, the temperature drops several degrees in the summer when entering this neighborhood. The nearby Lake Hills Presbyterian Church offers a walking trail and basketball and tennis courts available to anyone in the neighborhood. There is a neighborhood park, Maloney Park (previously Maxey's boat dock), on the lake with a boat ramp, playground, picnic pavilion, and a walking trail. The pocket park established in 2017 on Circle Lake, Lakemoor Legacy Park and Garden, is a certified wildlife habitat and is a rain garden demonstration project. Additionally, there are plans for the greenway to be constructed/expanded to connect Maloney Rd Park to I.C. King Park crossing the UT Farms property allowing Lakemoor Hills residents to walk or bike to two county parks. Adjoining lot at 2101 Woodmere also available. Perfect for the discerning buyer who appreciates both prestige and natural beauty, this property presents a once-in-a-lifetime chance to establish a waterfront legacy in one of Knoxville's most sought-after addresses.
